Environmental / 11 Building a More Sustainable Future
Building a More     
Sustainable F
uture
At Akamai, our sustainability efforts elevate our ability to power and 
protect life online. We are enthusiastic about realizing the plans and initiatives we began in 2022. We all share in the benefits of a globally connected internet from the cloud to the edge. Living our purpose to make life better for billions of people, billions of times a day, goes beyond creating a smooth internet experience to ensuring a positive societal one.
Taken by Nasdaq 
Incorporated - New York City, NY
